page.title: 04EVENTS_SALTASH MAYFAIR
page.content: {SALTASH MAYFAIR}IS THOUGHT TO BE BASED ON A BARTHOLEMEWS FAIR HELD IN AUGUST 7OO YEARS AGO. AT A LATER DATE THERE WAS A SALTASH FAIR IN JULY. IN 1938 AN HISTORICAL PAGEANT WAS PUT ON AT TREMATON FOR TWO YEARS BUT THE SECOND WORLD WAR PUT A STOP TO THAT. THE PRESENT MAYFAIR BEGAN IN 1977 TO CELEBRATE THE QUEENS SILVER JUBILEE.THE AIM OF THE FAIR IS (A) TO BOOST COMMUNITY SPIRIT(B)TO PROVIDE A MEANS TO GIVE AID FOR LOCAL VOLUNTARY ORGANISATIONS IN SALTASH BY THE PROVISION OF A FAIR AND OTHER EVENTS. PEOPLE FROM OUTSIDE SALTASH MAINLY COME TO ATTEND THE HALF MARATHON, THE CARNIVAL AND THE WHALER RACE. A MAY QUEEN AND TWO ATTENDANTS ARE CHOSEN FOR THE OCCASION.
